name: CHOW
description: CHOW is a purely meme-driven crypto project that embodies the playful and unpredictable spirit of the crypto world. It rejects the idea of secret societies, conspiracies, or centralized powers pulling the strings. Instead, CHOW is all about the simple, lighthearted fun of memes, community, and chaos. There’s no grand master plan, no hidden agenda—just CHOW CHOW, the loyal yet ferocious dog at the center of the movement. The project thrives on its community, fueled by humor, unpredictability, and the raw energy of internet culture. In the world of CHOW, the only rule is: there is no cabal, just CHOW.
